targets.expr: sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="$host", mode!="idle"}[$interval])) by (mode)* 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="$host", mode!="idle"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"})

seriesOverrides.alias: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete

targets.legendFormat: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete
